sense.def:
To contradict someone
pomeni reči, da je tisto, kar je nekdo pravkar povedal, neresnično.

seg.quote: I took care not to contradict her.
‘No,’ contradicted her sister, ‘it's because he doesn't care.’

sense.def:
Če ena trditev
contradicts another
, ne moreta biti obe trditvi resnični.

seg.quote: Perfectly reputable books may contradict each other.
